attributes.action: Have Full Transparency for the Iraq Inquiry with full disclosure
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the undersigned want you to honour your recent promise that you would be open with the electorate.  We therefore expect the inquiry into the Iraq war to be held in public with full disclosure to us at all times.  The Inquiry being held to be open, honest and not whitewashed as in previous inquiries.  The facts to be laid bare for all to see and blame apportioned accordingly to those at fault. 

The fact that this enquiry is to be held in secret and the results to be published after the election only goes to prove that nothing has changed and the promised openness is a sham offer trying to fool us.  We will not be fooled Mr Brown

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
